TEXT: e1: By purchasing illegally acquired tax data of citizens, the state is not only turning itself into a felon, but it is paying criminals, too.
CN RELATION: state, purchasing illegally acquired tax data (CapableOf)/citizens, tax data (HasA)/purchasing illegally acquired tax data, turning into a felon (DefinedAs)/purchasing illegally acquired tax data, turning into a felon (Causes)/purchasing illegally acquired tax data, paying criminals (DefinedAs)/purchasing illegally acquired tax data, paying criminals (Causes)

TEXT: e2: Besides, the purchase of such CDs is unnecessary today,
CN RELATION: purchase of CDs with tax data, unnecessary (HasProperty)

TEXT: e3: as, due to changed terms of business, many banks urge their customers to turn themselves in.
CN RELATION: banks, urge customers (CapableOf)/banks, terms of business (HasA)/banks, change terms of business (CapableOf)/banks, customers turning themselves in (Desires)/terms of business, turning themselves in (CausesDesire)/terms of business, turning themselves in (Causes)/change terms of business, turning themselves in (HasPrerequisite)/customers, turning themselves in (CapableOf)

TEXT: e4: Acquiring CDs with tax data of tax delinquents is therefore out of the question.
CN RELATION: tax delinquents, CDs with tax data (Causes)/acquiring CDs with tax data, out of the question (HasProperty)

TEXT: e5: It is indisputable, however, that by purchasing such data the state increases the pressure on tax evaders to turn themselves in.
